title: You Will Be Found
lyrics:
[intro, single strums]
Have you (Bm)ever felt like nobody was (D)there?
Have you (Bm)ever felt forgotten in the (D)middle of no(A)where?
Have you (Bm)ever felt like (G)you could dis(D)appear?
Like you could (Bm)fall (G) and no one (D-build up) would hear?
 
[normal strum]
Well, (Bm) let that lonely (G)feeling wash away (D) (D)
(Bm) Maybe there's a (G)reason, to be(D)lieve you'll be o(A)kay
'Cause (Bm)when you don't feel (G) strong enough to (D) stand (A)
You can (Bm)reach, (G) reach out (D) your hand
 
[pre-chorus]
And (A)oh-oh-(F#m)oh, (G)someone will come (Bm)running
And I (A) kno-o-(F#m)ow, they'll (G-stop)take you home
 
[chorus]
(D) Even when the dark comes crashing through
(A) When you need a friend to carry (Bm)you
And when you're broken on the (G)ground
You will be (D)found
So let the sun come streaming (A)in
'Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise a(Bm)gain
Lift your head and look a(G)round
You will be (D)found (A)
You will be (Bm)found (G-stop)

There's a (Bm)place where we don't (G)have to feel un(D)known (D)
(Bm) And every time you (G)call out you're a (D) little less a(A)lone
(Bm) Oh, if you (G)only say the (D)word (D)
Oh, (Bm) from across the (G)silence (D) your voice is (A)heard (A)
 
[chorus]
(D) Even when the dark comes crashing through
(A) When you need a friend to carry (Bm)you
And when you're broken on the (G)ground
You will be (D)found
So let the sun come streaming (A)in
'Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise a(Bm)gain
Lift your head and look a(G)round
You will be (D)found 
You will be (A)found 
You will be (Bm)found (G)
You will be (D)found 
You will be (A)found 
You will be (Bm)found (G) ah-ah
 
[bridge]
(C)Out of the shadows
The (G)morning is breaking and (D)all is new, and (A)all is new
It's (C)filling up the empty
And (G)suddenly I see, that (D)all is new, (A)all is new
 
[outro, single strum]
(D) Even when the dark comes crashing through
(A) When you need a friend to carry (Bm)you
And when you're broken on the (G)ground
You will be (D)found
So let the sun come streaming (A)in
'Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise a(Bm)gain
Lift your head and look a(G)round
You will be (D)found [end]
